title: Abandoned Farmland Restoration
summary_short: Restoring abandoned farmland to sequester carbon and improve soil health.
intro_short: This project focuses on transforming unused agricultural land into productive carbon sinks.
impact: Estimated to sequester 50,000 tons of CO2 annually while improving local biodiversity.

title: Alternative Cement
summary_short: Developing low-carbon cement alternatives to reduce industrial emissions.
intro_short: Revolutionary cement production methods that cut carbon emissions by up to 70%.
impact: Could reduce global cement industry emissions by 2 billion tons of CO2 per year.

title: Clean Cooking
summary_short: Providing efficient cooking solutions to reduce deforestation and emissions.
intro_short: Clean cooking technologies that replace traditional biomass burning methods.
impact: Prevents 10 million tons of CO2 emissions and saves 2 million hectares of forest annually.

title: Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure
summary_short: Building widespread EV charging networks to accelerate electric vehicle adoption.
intro_short: Comprehensive charging infrastructure supporting the transition to electric mobility.
impact: Supports 5 million EVs, reducing transportation emissions by 15 million tons of CO2 yearly.

title: Coastal Wetland Restoration
summary_short: Restoring coastal wetlands to protect shorelines and sequester carbon.
intro_short: Rehabilitating vital coastal ecosystems that serve as powerful carbon sinks.
impact: Sequesters 30,000 tons of CO2 per year while protecting communities from storm surges.

title: Green Steel Production
summary_short: Using hydrogen instead of coal to produce zero-emission steel.
intro_short: Revolutionary steel manufacturing process powered by renewable hydrogen.
impact: Eliminates 1.8 billion tons of CO2 emissions from global steel production.

title: Solar Panel Recycling
summary_short: Recycling end-of-life solar panels to recover valuable materials.
intro_short: Sustainable recycling solutions for aging solar panel infrastructure.
impact: Recovers 95% of materials from 10 million panels, preventing 500,000 tons of waste.

title: High-Speed Rail Network
summary_short: Expanding rail networks to reduce reliance on air and road travel.
intro_short: Modern high-speed rail connecting major cities with sustainable transportation.
impact: Reduces transportation emissions by 25 million tons of CO2 annually.

title: Regenerative Agriculture
summary_short: Implementing farming practices that restore soil health and capture carbon.
intro_short: Holistic farming methods that work with nature to rebuild healthy ecosystems.
impact: Sequesters 100,000 tons of CO2 per year while increasing crop yields by 20%.

title: Carbon Capture in Manufacturing
summary_short: Installing carbon capture systems in factories to trap emissions.
intro_short: Advanced technology capturing CO2 directly from industrial processes.
impact: Captures 5 million tons of CO2 annually from manufacturing facilities.

title: Community Solar Gardens
summary_short: Creating shared solar installations for neighborhoods and communities.
intro_short: Accessible renewable energy through community-owned solar projects.
impact: Generates 50 MW of clean energy, powering 15,000 homes sustainably.

title: Electric Bus Fleet
summary_short: Replacing diesel buses with electric alternatives in urban areas.
intro_short: Zero-emission public transportation serving cities and reducing air pollution.
impact: Eliminates 200,000 tons of CO2 and improves air quality for 2 million residents.
